infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: The DSP App needs access to your photo library to allow you to upload profile pictures and event photos for fraternity activities and member identification.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: The DSP App needs camera access to allow you to take photos for your profile, event documentation, and submission of required materials.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: The DSP App uses your location only when you're using the app to help you find nearby fraternity events and provide location-based services for event check-ins.
infoPlist.NSDocumentPickerUsageDescription: The DSP App needs access to your documents to allow you to upload files for scholarship submissions, event materials, and other fraternity-related documentation.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app does not track users for advertising purposes.
